1.0.name: wordpress/wp-filter-post-categories
1.0.description: This plugin allows you to choose which post categories youe site will show on your pages. Just go to settings and deselect the categories that you want to hide. For the homepage it will work automatically, for the other pages you have to add a shortcode into the page.
